message.text: Actions job or workflow does not limit the permissions of the GITHUB_TOKEN. Consider setting an explicit permissions block, using the following as a minimal starting point: {{contents: read}}

steps.name: build: checkout the latest changes
build: setup the node runtime
build: install the required dependencies
unit(test): perform lints and formatting checks
unit(test): perform check of typings
unit(test): perform unit test checks
unit(test): upload coverage to CodeCov
build: package code for distribution
pretest(inputs): save the push event trigger commit URL
pretest(inputs): save the pull request event trigger commit URL
integration(wfb): send a payload to workflow builder via webhook trigger
integration(wfb): confirm a payload was sent
integration(botToken): post a message to channel

with.payload:
channel: ${{ secrets.SLACK_CHANNEL_ID }}
text: ":checkered_flag: Action happens at <https://github.com/${{ github.repository }}>"

steps.name: integration(method): confirm a message was posted
integration(method): post a message with blocks

with.payload:
channel: ${{ secrets.SLACK_CHANNEL_ID }}
text: ":eyes: Event received..."
attachments:
  - color: "dbab09"
    fields:
      - title: "Status"
        short: true
        value: "Processing"

steps.name: integration(method): confirm the blocks were posted
integration(method): post a threaded message
integration(incoming): confirm the thread started
integration(method): wait to mock event processing
integration(method): update the original message

with.payload:
channel: ${{ secrets.SLACK_CHANNEL_ID }}
ts: "${{ steps.blocks.outputs.ts }}"
text: ":gear: Event processed!"
attachments:
  - color: "28a745"
    fields:
      - title: "Status"
        short: true
        value: "Completed"

steps.name: integration(method): post another threaded message
integration(method): post a file into a channel

with.payload:
channel_id: ${{ secrets.SLACK_CHANNEL_ID }}
initial_comment: ":robot_face: The codes exists here"
file: .github/workflows/test.yml
filename: action.yml

steps.name: integration(method): react to the completed update message
integration(method): confirm the thread ended
integration(incoming): post a message via incoming webhook

with.payload:
text: "Incoming webhook test for slack send"
blocks:
  - type: section
    text:
      type: plain_text
      text: ":link: A message was received via incoming webhook"
      emoji: true

steps.name: integration(incoming): confirm a webhook was posted
integration(incoming): reveal contents of the github payload
integration(incoming): post a message via payload file
integration(incoming): confirm a payload file was posted
chore(health): check up on recent changes to the health score
